analysis.description:
TokenProxy.withdrawTo (/unique_chucks/3/0xa7dfb33234098c66fde44907e918dad70a3f211c.sol#302-308) does not use the value returned by external calls:
	-TOKEN.transfer(_destination,_value) (/unique_chucks/3/0xa7dfb33234098c66fde44907e918dad70a3f211c.sol#307)

Reentrancy in TokenProxy.transferFromGate (/unique_chucks/3/0xa7dfb33234098c66fde44907e918dad70a3f211c.sol#279-296):
	External calls:
	- value = TOKEN.balanceOf(gate) (/unique_chucks/3/0xa7dfb33234098c66fde44907e918dad70a3f211c.sol#284-286)
	- Gate(gate).transferToProxy(value) (/unique_chucks/3/0xa7dfb33234098c66fde44907e918dad70a3f211c.sol#287-289)
	State variables written after the call(s):
	- balances (/unique_chucks/3/0xa7dfb33234098c66fde44907e918dad70a3f211c.sol#294-295)
	- totalSupply_ (/unique_chucks/3/0xa7dfb33234098c66fde44907e918dad70a3f211c.sol#294)

GolemNetworkTokenBatching.batchTransfer (/unique_chucks/3/0xa7dfb33234098c66fde44907e918dad70a3f211c.sol#320-341) uses timestamp for comparisons
	Dangerous comparisons:
	- require(bool)(block.timestamp >= closureTime) (/unique_chucks/3/0xa7dfb33234098c66fde44907e918dad70a3f211c.sol#322-323)
ReceivingContract.onTokenReceived (/unique_chucks/3/0xa7dfb33234098c66fde44907e918dad70a3f211c.sol#4-6) should be declared external
Gate.transferToProxy (/unique_chucks/3/0xa7dfb33234098c66fde44907e918dad70a3f211c.sol#20-27) should be declared external
